name: Escave (hzhu226)
description:
Escave has two stages of levels mainly: the player should first activate the mine cart on the lower floor, and then blast the blocking rock on the higher floor with self-made dynamite. The whole course requires the player to gather materials separated on both floors and to synthesize tools with them.

  • The levels are set in an underground cave full of stones, rocks, abandoned tools and structures. 
  • The player needs to activate the mine cart to pass the lava. The cart is running out of charge so that the player has to find a battery to start it. 
  • The player needs to blast the rock blocking the exit with a bomb. To make the dynamite, the player should first collect charcoal, nitrate, and sulfur, and then synthesize them at the workbench.
  • To acquire the knowledge of the escaping method, the player has to carefully read the paper left in the cave. No UI or text hints are given.
